name: part_004
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2024】Shirogane Noel Xmas 3D LIVE 【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [fTupWAFy6wo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: MC section with Shirogane Noel, Takane Lui, and Otonose Kanade. They discuss their similar movements, song covers, and share Christmas memories.
The trio decorates a giant Christmas tree by standing on large gift boxes and hanging ornaments.
Song performance transition. Himemori Luna appears from a giant gift box to perform with Noel.

subtitles.original: ね、二人が元気に動いてる姿こんな間近で見れて...
subtitles.english: Man, seeing you two moving so energetically up close like this...

subtitles.original: なんか動きが...あれ？
subtitles.english: Something about your movements... wait?

subtitles.original: だいたい同じ。イエーイ！
subtitles.english: They're pretty much the same. Yay!

subtitles.original: ちょっと、はしゃいじゃってるんですけど。
subtitles.english: Hey, you're getting a bit too excited.

subtitles.original: いやでもね、二人を呼んだ理由ちゃんとあります。
subtitles.english: But you know, there's a proper reason why I invited you two.

subtitles.original: お、何でしょう？
subtitles.english: Oh, what is it?

subtitles.original: 動きが変。
subtitles.english: Your movements are weird.

subtitles.original: いや確かにね。なんかふとした時にね、なんか二人ちょっと動き似てるって...
subtitles.english: Well, that's true. Sometimes we realize our movements are a bit similar...

subtitles.original: 団長ね、ちょっと、あの、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: I'm, well, thank you very much.

subtitles.original: 嬉しい、嬉しい。
subtitles.english: I'm happy, so happy.

subtitles.original: だけどそうではなく、あの、ま、今日歌った曲...
subtitles.english: But that's not it. The song we sang today...

subtitles.original: 歌ったことあるよね。
subtitles.english: You've sung it before, right?

subtitles.original: そうなんです、カバーしたことあるよね！
subtitles.english: That's right, we've covered it before!

subtitles.original: ぜひ、理々華ちゃんの「歌ってみた」も聞いてください。
subtitles.english: Please be sure to listen to Ririka-chan's cover version too.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！ぜひぜひ！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Please do!

subtitles.original: でも今回の方がめちゃめちゃめちゃいい感じなんで、そっちをいっぱい聞いて！
subtitles.english: But this time was way, way better, so listen to this one a lot!

subtitles.original: そしてね、やっぱ奏ちゃんはね、もう団長ReGLOSSの中で一番絡んでる、もう娘。
subtitles.english: And you know, Kanade-chan is the one in ReGLOSS I've interacted with most... she's like my daughter.

subtitles.original: ママ！ノエルママ！愛してるー！
subtitles.english: Mama! Noel-mama! I love you!

subtitles.original: 呼ばなきゃと思って、呼びました。
subtitles.english: I felt like I had to invite you, so here you are.

subtitles.original: 赤ちゃんだよ。ありがとう。ベイビーノエル。バブーノエル。
subtitles.english: I'm a baby. Thank you. Baby Noel. Babu-Noel.

subtitles.original: 嬉しい、ありがとうね、本当に歌いにも来てくれて。
subtitles.english: I'm happy. Thank you so much for coming to sing today.

subtitles.original: ちなみにお二人はクリスマスの思い出とかってありますか？
subtitles.english: By the way, do you two have any Christmas memories?

subtitles.original: はい！ / お、あります！
subtitles.english: Yes! / Oh, I have one!

subtitles.original: やっぱりクリスマスといえばケーキじゃないですか。
subtitles.english: Well, when you think of Christmas, you think of cake, right?

subtitles.original: だからクリスマスの終わった翌日に安くなったケーキをいっぱい食べることです。
subtitles.english: So my memory is eating lots of cake the day after Christmas when it gets cheaper.

subtitles.original: 素敵じゃん。大好き。
subtitles.english: That's lovely. I love that.

subtitles.original: ま、でもね、やっぱ味は変わんないしね。
subtitles.english: Well, the taste doesn't change after all.

subtitles.original: そう。でも安くなってる。やったね。
subtitles.english: Exactly. But it's cheaper. Score!

subtitles.original: 美味しさ二倍。
subtitles.english: Twice the deliciousness.

subtitles.original: 鷹嶺ちゃんらしき限界を感じますけれども。奏ちゃんは何ですか？
subtitles.english: I can feel the 'edge' typical of Takane-chan, but how about you, Kanade-chan?

subtitles.original: あ、奏も思い出あります！
subtitles.english: Oh, Kanade has a memory too!

subtitles.original: ちょっと良い子の皆さんは、ちょっとだけお耳を閉じていただきたいんですけど。
subtitles.english: I'd like all the good children out there to cover their ears for a moment.

subtitles.original: クリスマスのアレ、幼稚園にいた時の話なんですけど。
subtitles.english: It's a story from when I was in kindergarten, about... you know, that thing.

subtitles.original: 幼稚園のところに来たサンタのコスプレをしたおっさん...
subtitles.english: There was this middle-aged guy dressed as Santa who came to the kindergarten...

subtitles.original: おっさん？サンタさんでしょ、それ。
subtitles.english: Middle-aged guy? You mean Santa Claus, right?

subtitles.original: 白いカツラの下に黒髪が見えてたことが思い出です。
subtitles.english: My memory is seeing his black hair under the white wig.

subtitles.original: 夢がない！ / 違うよね。
subtitles.english: That's so cynical! / It's not like that.

subtitles.original: 染め忘れちゃったみたい、な。
subtitles.english: It was like... he just forgot to dye it.

subtitles.original: エクステだったんじゃない？おしゃれサンタさん。
subtitles.english: Maybe they were hair extensions? A fashionable Santa.

subtitles.original: やっぱ二人はいい思い出をありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Well, thank you both for those... 'great' memories.

subtitles.original: でも、これからもまだまだクリスマスライブは続いていくので...
subtitles.english: But the Christmas live is going to continue for a while longer...

subtitles.original: ちょっとお二人には、ここでお別れになっちゃうんですが。
subtitles.english: So I'm afraid it's time to say goodbye to you two for now.

subtitles.original: えー、寂しい！やだずっといたい！
subtitles.english: Ehh, how lonely! No, I want to stay forever!

subtitles.original: でもまだ、ちょっと残っててね。
subtitles.english: But wait, stay just a little bit longer.

subtitles.original: 団長ちょっとお二人にお願いがあります。
subtitles.english: I have a small favor to ask you two.

subtitles.original: あの後ろの、こちら見えますか？
subtitles.english: Can you see this over here, behind us?

subtitles.original: デカ！届かない！
subtitles.english: It's huge! I can't reach it!

subtitles.original: このクリスマスツリーに、飾り付けをお願いしてもいいですか？
subtitles.english: Could you help me decorate this Christmas tree?

subtitles.original: もちろん！
subtitles.english: Of course!

subtitles.original: 一緒に飾り付けしましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's decorate it together!

subtitles.original: 行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: わぁー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Wow! Yay!

subtitles.original: 飾り付けするぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's decorate!

subtitles.original: じゃあまずは、奏ちゃんから。
subtitles.english: Okay, first up, Kanade-chan.

subtitles.original: 頑張りまーす！奏ちゃん。
subtitles.english: I'll do my best! Kanade-chan.

subtitles.original: 投げちゃう。
subtitles.english: I'm gonna throw it.

subtitles.original: おー！できたー！
subtitles.english: Oh! You did it!

subtitles.original: はい次、鷹嶺。
subtitles.english: Okay, next, Takane.

subtitles.original: はい、つけまーす。
subtitles.english: Okay, I'm putting it on.

subtitles.original: どこに付けようかな？
subtitles.english: Where should I put it?

subtitles.original: じゃあ華麗に、えい！
subtitles.english: Then, with flair... hup!

subtitles.original: おー！美しい！
subtitles.english: Oh! Beautiful!

subtitles.original: 完璧完璧！ありがとう、お二人。
subtitles.english: Perfect, perfect! Thank you both.

subtitles.original: 引き続き頑張ってくださいね。
subtitles.english: Please keep doing your best.

subtitles.original: 頑張るぞー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Let's do this! Yay!

subtitles.original: 全身小悪魔精神 フローラル柑橘香水系
subtitles.english: Full-body little devil spirit, floral citrus perfume type

subtitles.original: 予備もばっちり
subtitles.english: Backups are all ready
